job_tasks.phrase: From intake and architecture to delivery and knowledge transfer, you will be part of every stage of the software lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the end-to-end involvement in software development projects, covering all phases from initial concept to final delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: improving not just systems but also the engineering culture of client organizations
job_tasks.justification: This highlights a focus on the practical application and integration of software engineering practices within client organizations.

job_tasks.phrase: experiment with cutting-edge technologies in areas such as generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role in exploring and potentially implementing generative AI technologies, which falls under model development and application.

soft_skills.phrase: work with emotionally intelligent, experienced teammates
Your ability to inspire, communicate effectively, and bring people together will be critical

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes broad software engineering responsibilities and polyglot programming using JVM languages and others. While it mentions experimenting with generative AI, this is a minor aspect rather than a core focus. The role is primarily a Senior Software Engineer with an interest in emerging tech, not a specialized GenAI Engineer.
